what the hell? i can't get the audio track for English to work on my ps3 media server. and why is it so damn hard to find this show in English? it was filmed in English and wrote in it so what the fuck? do i have to spend the time to edit this shit and upload my own version for people because dipshits can't upload this the way it was filmed?
